name: Sweet Revenge (LauraDG)
description:
As we know, thousands of candies are eaten every year for the holiday of Halloween.

But this year the situation will change.

The remaining candies decide to kidnap a child and sacrifice him for all the deaths of their sweets brothers and sisters.

You will play as a child, who escapes during the ritual, and tries to find a way out of the candy lair. But the way to escape will be the candies themselves.

Main Team

Game and Level Designer, Art:
Giovanni Francesco Negri-Clementi

Game Developer:
Laura De Guio

Other credit

Models and Animations:
Kay Lousberg (itch.io)

Audio:
Pick up candy sound: "Chewing, Breadstick, Single, A.wav" by InspectorJ (Freesound.org)

Candy monsters: "monster020a.wav" by missozzy (Freesound.org)

"Ghost of the Kitchen" by Arthur Vyncke (SoundCloud.com)

"STROLLING AROUND" by Myuu (SoundCloud.com)

"Play with Me" by Myuu (SoundCloud.com)

Font:

"Blood Crow" by Iconian Fonts (DaFont.com)

"Feast of Flesh BB" by Blambot (DaFont.com)
